main_description: Enthusiastic software engineer, with an eye to detail and the ability to build what you want. I'm also a data analyst and a designer.
about_me_content: I am a software developer who is deeply passionate about learning, expanding my network, and constantly improving. Although I am currently residing in Ecuador, I was born in Venezuela and I’m half Portuguese. My goal is to consistently strive for personal growth and ensure that I am a better version of myself by the end of each day. I maintain an open mindset, always eager to acquire new knowledge and skills.

projects_content.title: Webnews landing page
projects_content.description: This is one of my Frontend Mentor Challenges. Is a simple static website to test my layout abilities.

projects_content.title: Courses Informational page
projects_content.description: I built and deployed a NextJS app using prisma for a courses informational page.

skills_content.title: Python
skills_content.description: My first language (over 4 years of using it), I can build APIs, desktop applications, machine learning and data exploration using it.

skills_content.title: Next.JS
skills_content.description: I'm experienced with React and Next.JS to build beautiful websites. I've used Prisma to allow for dynamic websites.

skills_content.title: Tailwind
skills_content.description: My favorite way of doing styles allowing for quick css work. I've also used Standard CSS, Styled Components, Bootstrap and SASS.

skills_content.title: Design
skills_content.description: I've work as a designer for 3 years, allowing to spread information and ideas through visual components. Experience with Figma, Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.

skills_content.title: Openess
skills_content.description: I'm an open individual that can learn whatever is needed to solve a problem. Giving it all to accomplish whatever I set my mind to.

skills_content.title: Communication
skills_content.description: I'm able to express complex ideas in simple words. I can also speak English, Spanish and Portuguese.

remarks_content.title: 2ND PLACE ON CODE CHALLENGE 2023
remarks_content.description: As part of a collaborative team, I contributed to the development of an AI-powered web service targeting the financial sector. Utilizing NextJS and FastAPI, we were able to create a fully functional solution within a tight deadline of just one day. Our exceptional effort and innovative approach led us to secure the second place in a highly competitive software development competition.

remarks_content.title: Google Data Analytics Certificate
remarks_content.description: I successfully completed the Google Data Analytics course, where I honed my skills in data analysis, specifically focusing on SQL, R, Excel, and Tableau. As part of the course's capstone project, I conducted a thorough analysis of the power progression in Terraria, a popular game.

name: Name
